plays.text: Goal scored by Mattias Ohlund assisted by Todd Bertuzzi and Brent Sopel
Penalty to Mike Comrie 2 minutes for High Sticking Matt Cooke
Penalty to Scott Ferguson 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Henrik Sedin 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Tommy Salo
Penalty to Jarkko Ruutu 2 minutes for Tripping Steve Staios
Goal scored by Shawn Horcoff assisted by Mike Comrie
Penalty to Artem Chubarov 2 minutes for Holding Jason Chimera
Penalty to Ethan Moreau 2 minutes for Charging Ed Jovanovski
Penalty to Darren Langdon 2 minutes for Elbowing Mike Comrie
Goal scored by Ales Pisa assisted by Steve Staios and Todd Marchant
Goal scored by Trevor Linden assisted by Daniel Sedin and Henrik Sedin
Penalty to Marty Reasoner 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Markus Naslund
Goal scored by Brendan Morrison assisted by Ed Jovanovski and Trevor Linden
